channel.title: 562 changing PkPoints count each kills?
channel.description:
Hi, i got a 562, atomic scape base and i cant find how to change pkpoints count each kills. Theres the code in deathevent.java [code=java] } else if (entity instanceof Player) { Player player = (Player) entity; if (player.getKiller() != null) { Player p2 = (Player) player.getKiller(); p2.KC++; p2.PkPoints++; p2.getActionSender().sendMessage("You Have Defeated "+player.getUsername()+"."); p2.getActionSender().sendMessage("You Downed "+player.getUsername()+ " You Have Now "+p2.PkPoints+ " Shops Points"); player.getWalkingQueue().reset(); player.PvPDrop(p2); }[/code] Thank You! :D
not solved :(

item.title: 562 changing PkPoints count each kills?
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“laurent 248, post:1, topic:361152”][quote]Hi, i got a 562, atomic scape base and i cant find how to change pkpoints count each kills. Theres the code in deathevent.java

[code=java]
} else if (entity instanceof Player) {
Player player = (Player) entity;
if (player.getKiller() != null) {
Player p2 = (Player) player.getKiller();
p2.KC++;
p2.PkPoints++;
p2.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You Have Defeated “+player.getUsername()+”.”);
p2.getActionSender().sendMessage("You Downed "+player.getUsername()+ " You Have Now “+p2.PkPoints+ " Shops Points”);
player.getWalkingQueue().reset();
player.PvPDrop(p2);

        }[/code]

Thank You! :D[/quote]

not solved :([/quote]

p2.KC++;
p2.PkPoints++;

The “++” operator only increments one. So when you do the “–” opertor, it decrements one. It’s easy enough to increment more than one, all you have to do is this.

p2.KC += number;
p2.PkPoints += number;

Or if you want to decrement by more than one.

p2.KC -= number;
p2.PkPoints -= number;

Read full topic

item.title: 562 changing PkPoints count each kills?
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

Hi, i got a 562, atomic scape base and i cant find how to change pkpoints count each kills. Theres the code in deathevent.java

[code=java]
} else if (entity instanceof Player) {
Player player = (Player) entity;
if (player.getKiller() != null) {
Player p2 = (Player) player.getKiller();
p2.KC++;
p2.PkPoints++;
p2.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You Have Defeated “+player.getUsername()+”.”);
p2.getActionSender().sendMessage("You Downed "+player.getUsername()+ " You Have Now “+p2.PkPoints+ " Shops Points”);
player.getWalkingQueue().reset();
player.PvPDrop(p2);

        }[/code]

Thank You!

not solved
